price: Nokorε sε Yεde Yεn nsεnkyerεnee no nyinaa kyerεε Farao, nanso obuu no atorͻsεm na ͻpoe (wannye anni).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرَيۡنَٰهُ ءَايَٰتِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad araynāhu āyātinā kullahā fakadhaba wa-abā
